desc.en:
The Earth Magic skill is a class magic skill. The magic skill determines what spells you can learn from the earth line of magic.

The following playable classes get the earth magic skill:

  • Elementalist
  • Wizard

There are generally two categories of magic spells:

  • Combat castable
  • Out of combat castable

Spells in this magic line fall into both categories as it contains damage and paralysis spells you can use in combat and out.

To learn more spells you need to find spell scrolls or visit an Earth magic spell trainer who can teach you more spells.
